attributes.action: Publically Name and Shame Hotels/Restaurants/Take Aways etc That Breach Food Hygiene Rules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without naming names I have heard rumours from others that several hotel kitchens in my area alone have pest infestations and mangagers who continually ignore food hygiene regulations. I think offending outlets should be named and shamed in local newspapers, websites etc.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
